item.title: Charlie Kirk’s Martyrdom Is Bringing People To Christ, And The Church Should Be Ready
item.description: 'For this really to stick, it is not emotion that's going to win the day. It's the message of the gospel, which will not change.'

item.title: Erika Kirk Courageously Shows The Two Roads Before America
item.description: Charlie Kirk's widow shared the true Gospel of love and salvation in contrast to the left's secular religion of political hate and division.
